actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, to permit the sale of coffee at rest and recreation areas on Interstate System rights-of-way.

summary.text: Permits the sale of coffee at rest and recreation areas on Interstate System rights-of- way. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 111)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, to permit the sale of coffee at rest and recreation areas on Interstate System rights-of-way.
